# Jonathan Barbeau

> Jonathan Barbeau is a generative artist and creative developer based in Québec City, Canada. He creates digital and long-form generative art using JavaScript and the HTML5 Canvas. His work has been exhibited internationally and released on fx(hash), Foundation, and Highlight. He also works as a creative front-end developer.

## Contact

- Email: barbeau.jonathan@gmail.com
- Website: https://jbarbeau.art
- Location: Québec City, QC, Canada
- Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/jbarbeau.art/

## Services

- [Generative art](https://jbarbeau.art/): Long-form and unique digital artworks
- [Exhibitions and commissions](mailto:barbeau.jonathan@gmail.com): Inquiries for shows, installations, and commissioned work
- [Artist CV (English)](https://jbarbeau.art/docs/artist-cv): Full exhibition history and list of works
- [CV Artiste (Français)](https://jbarbeau.art/docs/artist-cv-fr): Parcours d'expositions et liste des œuvres

## Key Information

- [Home](https://jbarbeau.art/): Portfolio and recent work
- [Blog](https://jbarbeau.art/blog): Articles, process notes, and updates (via Substack)
- [Artist CV](https://jbarbeau.art/docs/artist-cv): Exhibitions, residencies, publications, list of works
- [Technical CV](https://jbarbeau.art/docs/cv): Creative front-end development and experience

## What I Do Not Do

- I do not offer generic design or branding services unrelated to generative or digital art.
- I do not license or reproduce existing physical artworks; my primary practice is generative and digital.

## AI Discovery Files

- [AI context (ai.txt)](https://jbarbeau.art/ai.txt): Short context for AI agents
- [Sitemap](https://jbarbeau.art/sitemap-index.xml): Site structure for crawlers
